titleStmt.title: The Humble remonstrance and petition of certain churches vvalking in the fellowship of the faith and in the order of the Gospel with the Churches of Christ in America who joyn in this remonstrance and petition with many other godly persons (including some of our brethren now in Scotland) : having also the full content and concurrence of many others elsewhere ...

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
